name: SKYROCKET (Venplock)
description:
SKYROCKET is an upcoming 2D platformer focused on using the explosive force of a rocket launcher to navigate through terrain and obstacles. 

Press "Q" to open the pause menu.

Press "R" while in game to reset the run.

Inspired by Team Fortress 2's rocket jumping mechanic,  Jump King by Nexile, and Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy , the map is designed to be unforgiving.  Try not to fall.

Gain speed and momentum by correctly timing your rockets. Use the explosion radius to bounce off walls and discover new techniques to improve your time.

🚀

Lagging in fullscreen? Try enabling Hardware Acceleration in your browser setting.

Speedrun in 0:50 by Venplock

v0.1.1 update

Launcher darkens when unable to fire rocket.

Larger crosshair cursor.

Mute music while keeping sound effects.
